TopicTitle: Minmus satellite delivery contract not completing.

Articles.Content:
In career mode on a clean installation of 1.0.4 32-bit (I have the Asteroid Day mod installed), I accepted a satellite delivery for an equatorial orbit around Minmus. It's requirements are as follows:

- Launch a new probe with power generating ability and communications devices
- Reach the designated equatorial orbit within marginal deviation:
- (+)Orbital Specifics
- Apoapsis: 270,338 m
- Periapsis: 257,256 m
- Inclination: 180 degrees
- Longitude of Ascending Node: Undefined
- Argument of Periapsis: Undeifined
- Have a thermometer on the satellite
- Keep stable orbit for at least 10 seconds

I had green check marks on all of these, save for the second one, which is bizarre as my orbit's parameters were:

- Apoapsis: 270,520
- Periapsis: 257,842
- Inclination: 179.9 degrees.

Screenshots:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/5x5nP)

Computer Specs:

- OS: Windows 7 Home Premium
- Processor: Intel Core i7-3615QM CPU @ 2.30 GHz
- RAM: 8 GB (7.79 GB usable)
- System Type 64-bit OS

The ascending and descending nodes display the relative inclination between your vessel and the target orbit, not between your vessel and the body you are orbiting.

you are going the wrong way.
